frames.caption: A modern living room with large floor-to-ceiling windows overlooks a snowy forest. The interior features a cozy seating area with a plush sofa and a coffee table adorned with flowers. Warm lighting and wooden accents create a welcoming atmosphere.
frames.description: The scene is set in a contemporary living room with expansive windows offering a view of a snow-covered forest. The room is elegantly furnished with a focus on comfort and style, highlighted by the warm lighting and natural wood elements.

frames.caption: A modern, spacious living area with high ceilings and large windows showcasing a snowy outdoor scene. A person stands near a dining table, surrounded by warm wooden tones and elegant lighting fixtures.
frames.description: The scene is set in a contemporary, open-plan living and dining area with a mezzanine level. The space is characterized by its high ceilings, large windows, and warm, inviting decor, creating a cozy yet sophisticated atmosphere.

summary: Nature: snow, forest, trees. Objects: sofa, coffee table, flowers, windows, lighting. Scenes: living room, interior, indoor, dining area. Emotions: cozy, welcoming, calm. People: person. Actions: standing. Concepts: modern design, interior decor
